sentences.en: A common interest in gardening brought Molly and Loretta into closer rapport.
sentences.cn: 对园艺共同的爱好使莫莉及罗瑞塔关系更密切.

sentences.en: And last but not least, people with whom you can build a rapport and camaraderie with.
sentences.cn: 一直到最后、并非最不重要的一个人，与你建立起和谐融洽的友谊。

sentences.en: Conveying respect and being non judgmental are necessary ingredients for building rapport.
sentences.cn: 建立这样的关联需要有尊重以及不施加评判的心.

sentences.en: He had never quarreled openly with Roosevelt but never felt a moment of rapport.
sentences.cn: 他跟罗斯福从没公开争吵过,但也以没感到他们之间关系融洽.

sentences.en: He is oversensitive – it's difficult to establish a rapport with him.
sentences.cn: 他心眼儿太多,很难打交道.

sentences.en: His fluent Japanese has helped him build a rapport with Japanese companies.
sentences.cn: 流利的日文帮助他与日企建立了融洽关系.

sentences.en: If you have a good rapport with a dealer, they will always let you have first refusal on anything interesting.
sentences.cn: 如果你和经销商关系好，好东西他们会任你先挑。

sentences.en: She has an excellent rapport with her staff.
sentences.cn: 她跟她职员的关系非常融洽.

sentences.en: She understood the importance of establishing a close rapport with clients.
sentences.cn: 她懂得与客户建立密切和谐的关系的重要性。

sentences.en: The actor developed a close rapport with his audience.
sentences.cn: 该演员与观众建立了密切的关系.

sentences.en: The success depends on good rapport between interviewer and interviewee.
sentences.cn: 成功取决于采访者与被采访者之间的良好沟通。

sentences.en: The use of eye contact in building attraction and rapport was amazing.
sentences.cn: 眼神吸引之法真是太神奇了.

sentences.en: We ask the Lord to grant us good fellowship and candid rapport.
sentences.cn: 求主赐美好的团契,坦诚的交流.

sentences.en: We developed a high degree of trust and a considerable personal rapport.
sentences.cn: 我们发展了高度的互相信任和不错的私人融洽关系.

sentences.en: Yet the overarching theme is rapport -- and establishing some.
sentences.cn: 当然,本次会面最重要的主题是英美关系的 进展 问题.

sentences.en: You have an intellectual rapport, a kind of easy companionship that makes me really jealous.
sentences.cn: 你机智友善、平易近人，真是让我嫉妒。

words.tran_cn: 友好；恢复邦交；友善关系的建立
密切关系，交往；和谐一致

trans.tran_en: friendly agreement and understanding between people
